notes: Cover title: Museum of the Mad!

SUMMARY: The Glob, Man-Thing and The Hulk have been captured by The Collector for his private spaceship/ museum; The Hulk leads a revolt of the exhibits, who have been held for many years, but upon leaving the museum age catches up with them and they crumble. I. [Each creator] II. The Incredible Hulk. III. Museum of the Mad! k. Madness. k. Syndromes. k. The Glob. k. Man-Thing. k. The Hulk. k. The Collector. k. Museums. k. Exhibits. k. Age. k. Crumbling.
